title: Warrior III
description: Balancing, Core, Standing Primary body parts engaged Abs, Glutes & Hip Flexors, Hamstrings, Shoulders Middle Back / Lats, Upper Back & Lower Traps Strengthens legs, shoulders and back Tones abdominal organs Balances nervous system, improves balance How to perform Warrior Iii Begin standing. Reach your hands toward the sky with an inhale, palms facing each other. Bring your weight into your right foot. Bend forward from your hips with an exhale, lifting your left leg straight back. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
